post.title: PRISM Project‚Äôs Naki Kamizuki Gets YouTube Channel Terminated Temporarily
post.content:
Naki Kamizuki, a VTuber from PRISM Project, has announced that her YouTube channel was terminated for no reason after all. The channel termination follows after Naki did a watch-along for the first three episodes of the anime series Fuuto Pi, albeit she has reasoned that she hasn‚Äôt shown anything on screen when her channel was terminated.

HUH WHAT?????
GUYS WHAT'S HAPPENING....?????

I LITERALLY JUST DID A WATCHALONG WITH NOTHING SHOWN ON SCREEN HOW HUH???? pic.twitter.com/WApgkQLVjN

— Naki Kamizuki / ‰∏äÊúà„Å™„Åçüåõ @ PRISM Project 4th Gen (@nakikamizuki) August 20, 2022

Following the incident, PRISM Project has stated that they are investigating YouTube‚Äôs actions regarding the channel termination, and rest assured that they will provide more information in the following days.

[Regarding Naki Kamizuki's YouTube channel]

We are currently investigating YouTube's channel action on Naki Kamizuki's account and will provide more information when it is available. Thank you for your patience in the meantime!

— PRISM Project (@PRISMproj) August 20, 2022

Putting humor regarding the situation, Naki joked that the reason for her channel to get terminated was due to her showing her thighs on stream.

The channel is now restored after almost seven hours, but she has postponed her book club stream until they hear feedback from YouTube regarding this matter.

I lived bitch üò§

My channel is back up!! But until we hear back from YouTube, I'm moving the book club stream to next weeküò≠

Thank you for your support!! It was super encouraging to receive so many nice replies from everyone TT^TT
I hope everything is resolved soon!üôè pic.twitter.com/phuIwkH7vI

— Naki Kamizuki / ‰∏äÊúà„Å™„Åçüåõ @ PRISM Project 4th Gen (@nakikamizuki) August 20, 2022

Naki Kamizuki is part of PRISM Project‚Äôs fourth generation, alongside Sara Nagare, Sumi Ushio and Non Anon. She debuted on November 13, 2021, and has recently celebrated her birthday on August 13.

PRISM Project has also stated that orders for Naki‚Äôs birthday merchandise and voice pack will be only available up until next week.

post.description: Naki Kamizuki, a VTuber from PRISM Project, has announced that her YouTube channel was terminated for no reason after all. The channel termination follows after Naki did a watch-along for the first three episodes of the anime series 'Fuuto Pi.'

node.title: Nijisanji EN at Animate Cafe

node.description: Slime alien VTuber and Kawa colleague PiaPi Yuefo shares her experience at the recent Nijisanji EN Animate Cafe collaboration.
